Package com.xmlmind.ditac.util Description

Utilities and helpers used to implement com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.PreProcessor, the ditac preprocessor.

The only documented interfaces and classes are those related to the resolution of URIs using XML catalogs. Such interfaces and classes are useful to allow embedding ditac in an application.

Other utilities are not documented but in principle, they are not needed to embed ditac in an application.
